alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 02 at 9:11AM CST until March 04 at 8:09AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Roubidoux Creek Near Waynesville affecting Pulaski County. Gasconade River at Jerome affecting Phelps County. .Heavy rainfall tonight and Friday will likely cause the river to rise above flood stage. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Roubidoux Creek near Waynesville. * WHEN...From Friday afternoon to Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, low parts of Spring Road south of Business 66 in Waynesville flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CST Thursday the stage was 0.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 7.5 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
